activities:
81qd is a leading data analytics company that derives and transforms insight into action across all media via semantic learning platforms and technologies. 81qd helps its pharmaceutical and biotechnology clients optimize the clinical and commercial potential of their brands.

81qd collects data in a variety of ways, including programmatic and manual mining of publicly available information. 81qd also conducts engagement activities with opinion leaders in various disease states to help its clients better execute in the marketplace and build stronger relationships with their customers. In the course of its business, 81qd receives personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland that may be linked to an individual, either collected directly from the individual or from publicly available sources.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
